name: Dr. Rajendra Prasad
details: First President of India, served two terms.

name: Dr. Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan
details: Second President of India and a renowned philosopher.

name: Dr. Zakir Husain
details: Third President of India and the first Muslim to hold the office.

name: V. V. Giri
details: Fourth President of India, served as acting President before his election.

name: Dr. Fakhruddin Ali Ahmed
details: Fifth President of India, known for his role during the emergency period.

name: Giani Zail Singh
details: Seventh President of India and a prominent figure in Indian politics.
